price: (Malayika) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri ndi Intumwa ya Nyagasani wawe ije kuguha (inkuru) y’impano y’umuhungu wejejwe (ibyaha).”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
